title: Get to Know Our First Team
subtitle: Get to know the talented players who form the backbone of FC City Boys Zurich and drive our success on the field.

introduction.title: Meet Our Team
introduction.subtitle: Excellence Through Unity
introduction.description: FC City Boys Zurich is built on a foundation of talent, dedication, and unwavering team spirit. Our players come from diverse backgrounds, united by their passion for football and commitment to excellence. Together, we strive to achieve greatness both on and off the pitch.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Triumphs & Milestones
achievements.description: A legacy of success built through hard work, determination, and unwavering commitment to excellence.

trainingSchedule.title: Training Schedule
trainingSchedule.subtitle: Commitment to Excellence
trainingSchedule.description: Structured training sessions designed to develop skills, build fitness, and foster team cohesion.

vision.title: Club Vision
vision.subtitle: Our Path Forward
vision.description: We envision a future where FC City Boys Zurich stands as a beacon of excellence in Swiss football, nurturing talent, building character, and creating lasting memories for players and supporters alike.
vision.missionText: To develop world-class footballers while fostering values of respect, discipline, and unity. We aim to create an environment where every player can reach their full potential.
vision.valuesText: Excellence, Integrity, Unity, Respect, and Passion guide everything we do. These core values shape our culture and drive our success.
vision.goalsText: To compete at the highest level, develop youth talent, strengthen community bonds, and build a legacy that inspires future generations.

testimonials.title: What They Say
testimonials.subtitle: Voices from Our Community
testimonials.description: Hear from players, coaches, and supporters about their experiences with FC City Boys Zurich.

player1.name: John Smith
player1.quote: Being part of FC City Boys has been transformative. The coaching, the camaraderie, and the commitment to excellence have made me a better player and person.

player2.name: Michael Johnson
player2.quote: The team spirit here is unmatched. We push each other to be better every day, and that's what makes us successful.

coach.name: Thomas MÃ¼ller
coach.quote: This club represents more than just football. It's about building character, fostering unity, and creating a legacy that extends beyond the pitch.

fan.name: Sarah Williams
fan.quote: The passion and dedication of this team is incredible. Every match is a celebration of what football should be about.

cta.title: Join Our Journey
cta.subtitle: Be Part of Something Great
cta.description: Whether you're a player, coach, or supporter, there's a place for you in the FC City Boys family. Join us and be part of our exciting journey.
